artist: Designer: James H. Bowen; Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843–1950s
description: 3 dimensional face of a cat in circular frame on top of a raised pedestal with organic design; clown with pointed hat standing on hands balancing a yellow ball with his feet; dog like animal hugs ball; another dog-like animal on other side of base supporting clown
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [46G 8.4.12 / \"Cat and Mouse\" / Type II / 76500 3400 / #39M]
title: "Cat and Mouse, Cat Balancing" mechanical bank
